item.title: Now
item.description: What Iâ€™m doing now Work: I lead Machine Learning Engineering for Verloop - we help automate conversations between you and a business. Life: Rather scattered and still confused Torschlusspaniki / Panicking About the word My previous workplaces made a serious dent in the size of my dreams. It is only at welcoming meadow-like work culture at Verloop - that I’ve come to feel like going back on the chase.
